description: Try our easy to follow Chicken, Olive And Tomato One Pot recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Chicken, Olive And Tomato One Pot
name: Chicken, Olive And Tomato One Pot Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1.6 kg free range bone in chicken pieces with skin
3 tbs Monini Classico Extra Virgin Olive Oil
